titleStmt.title: Hobson's choice a poem in answer to The choice / written by a Person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Person of quality.
Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by John Nutt ...,

notesStmt.note: "Attributed to Thomas Brown in Wrenn Catalogue"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"The choice" was written by John Pomfret.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
